scripts.docker-build:dev: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml build
scripts.docker-build:prod: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml build
scripts.docker-kill: docker kill $(docker ps -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
scripts.docker-prisma-migrate-dev:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:dev
scripts.docker-prisma-migrate-status:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:status
scripts.docker-prisma-migrate-reset:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:reset
scripts.docker-prisma-pull:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run pull:dev
scripts.docker-prisma-push:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run push:dev
scripts.docker-prisma-seed:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run seed:dev
